actions.text: Amendment SA 845 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Lincoln to Amendment SA 539. To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the increase in the refundability of the child tax credit, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 845 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Lincoln to Amendment SA 539.

amends_amendment.purpose: To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.

purpose: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the increase in the refundability of the child tax credit, and for other purposes.
